name: Pico Gunman
description:
Pico Gunman was made for theJFO #3 jam with the theme: Retro Remake. 

Made in PICO-8 under a week!

At the moment mouse is needed to play.  (Touch controls also work but are a bit iffy)

Updates Later!

Gamemodes:

  • Single Duel - Test your reflexes against a single, progressively faster enemy!
  • Double Duel - Double the Gunmans, double the fun!
  • Saloon Fight  - Wave based gamemode. 10 enemies in each, with faster and faster speeds. You have only 15 ammo each turn so careful with your aim!

Thanks for Csöndi and Sztrovacsek for the support over at Ko-fi!
